# Further Reading and Resources

## Websites of the verious packages used in the workshop
There are plenty of online resources to help you with your analyses and programming.

The [Biopython website](http://biopython.org/DIST/docs/tutorial/Tutorial.html)
has an extensive set of tutorials and "recipes" for lots of DNA sequence data focused tasks.

[Pandas](https://pandas.pydata.org/docs/getting_started/tutorials.html) also supply many tutorials and demo data sets on which you can try your skills

There is a lot more information on [Matplotlib](https://matplotlib.org/stable/tutorials/index.html), including a great number of tutorials on the website.

## eBooks
[The Python Data Science Handbook](https://jakevdp.github.io/PythonDataScienceHandbook/)

[Learn Python the right way](https://learnpythontherightway.com/)
